game.name: Wild City
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 식물, 동물 및 곤충이 서로 상호 작용하고 사냥하는 덱 빌더입니다. 확장되는 보드에 카드를 배치하여 만족스러운 연쇄 반응을 유도하고 연결된 생태계를 형성하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The deckbuilder where cards are plants, animals, and insects that can synergize and prey on each other. Place your cards on an expanding board to trigger satisfying chain reactions and shape an interconnected ecosystem.
